articles.title: Los Angeles Angels equal dubious MLB milestone with 7 home runs hit in losing cause
articles.description: The Los Angeles Angels tied a dubious major league record when they smashed seven home runs -- all solo shots -- but still lost to the Oakland Athletics 8-7 Thursday.

articles.title: Detroit Tigers legend Miguel Cabrera uncertain if he'll play beyond this season
articles.description: Miguel Cabrera, who had previously stated he would like to play in 2023, admitted Thursday he's not sure if this season will be his curtain call.
articles.content:
Detroit Tigers legend Miguel Cabrera for the first time on Thursday said this may be the final season in his Hall of Fame career.

articles.title: Brittney Griner sentenced to nine years in Russian prison
articles.description: Brittney Griner has been found guilty of drug possession and smuggling and was sentenced to nine years in a Russian prison, an expected conclusion to her trial that should allow negotiations for a prisoner swap to accelerate.
